attributes.action: Remove police protection from Government Ministers
attributes.additional_details:
The money saved should fund more PCs across the Country.
Police Forces are being depleted, there is a lack of front line services, our brave officers, particulary in rural areas, rely on back up that could be half an hour away. 
Removing close protection from Ministers would concentrate their minds on the dangers others experience.
attributes.background: Until such time as they acknowledge the lack of policing the remainder of the population are experiencing.
